name: Tomb Raider V: Chronicles
description:
This script will install "Tomb Raider V: Chronicles" with support for modern resolution.
During install please let all options by default.
This script uses different projects:
dgVoodoo2: http://www.dege.freeweb.hu/
Tomb Raider 2-3-4 Widescreen Patch created by Mr.Blackfour : https://tombraiders.net/stella/downloads/widescreen.html
Other sources: https://www.tombraiderforums.com
Thanks to the people who contributed to play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- "Tomb Raider IV: Chronicles" has insufficient controller support, I invite you to use a keymapper. You will find profiles for x360 (Antimicro) and Steam Controller (sc-controller) in the "gamepad profiles" folder.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.installer: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/"; mv dgVoodoo.conf dgVoodoo_original.conf
cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/"; rm -f -r unins000.* webcache.zip support.ico Launch* gog* 3Dfx MS Doc

content:
custom-name: Tomb Raider V - Chronicles
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG
- dgv: http://dege.freeweb.hu/dgVoodoo2/dgVoodoo2_55_4_1.zip
- menu1: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%205%20-%20Chronicles/TR5CM1.BAT
- menu2: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%205%20-%20Chronicles/TR5CM2.BAT
- gpx360: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%205%20-%20Chronicles/gamepad%20profiles/tr5_x360.gamecontroller.amgp
- gpsteam: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%205%20-%20Chronicles/gamepad%20profiles/tr5_steam.sccprofile
- gpreadme: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%205%20-%20Chronicles/gamepad%20profiles/tr5_gamepad_readme.html
- wpp: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%205%20-%20Chronicles/tr5c.bmp
- patch: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%204%20-%20The%20Last%20Revelation/TombRaider234_Patch.zip
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/TR5CM1.BAT
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/
    file: dgv
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/MS/DDraw.dll
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/MS/D3DImm.dll
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/"; mv dgVoodoo.conf dgVoodoo_original.conf
- write_config:
    data:
      DirectX:
        ForceVerticalSync: true
        Resolution: max_qhd_isf
        VRAM: 256
        dgVoodooWatermark: false
      General:
        CaptureMouse: false
        FullScreenMode: false
        ScalingMode: stretched_ar
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/dgVoodoo.conf
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/
    src: patch
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ddraw
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_47
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/
    src: menu1
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/
    src: menu2
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    src: wpp
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/gamepad profiles/
    src: gpreadme
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/gamepad profiles/
    src: gpx360
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/gamepad profiles/
    src: gpsteam
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: wallpaper
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\tr5c.bmp
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GradientActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 191 166 12
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 5/"; rm -f -r unins000.* webcache.zip
      support.ico Launch* gog* 3Dfx MS Doc
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
